given_prompt.objective: An extremely simplified version of Microsoft Paint as a web app using html, javascript, and css.
given_prompt.method: Single html document with script and style tags, fully functional in browser as single file, HTML canvas for the drawing surface.
given_prompt.specifications: User can choose from three paintbrush textures, choose any color from a dedicated menu, erase, control sizing of paint brush and eraser, resize canvas, and undo/redo actions.

scores.ChatGPT: A+ (Met all requirements and added other intuitive and functional features beyond the prompt)
scores.Gemini: B (Square brush really choppy, boring design overall)
scores.Claude: B (Sketch brush interesting but sloppy, boring design overall)
scores.Grok: B (Uses alert for canvas resizing, boring design overall)

llm_analysis.notes: ChatGPT required additional fixing in its code after generation to work, but the mistake was common and easy to fix.

llm_analysis.scalability: Medium (Global settings in applySettings, history management is complex)
Medium-Low (Logic for different textures is mixed in draw function)
llm_analysis.intuition: Medium (Simple, but lacks clear separation of concerns)
Low (Undo/Redo logic is confusingly coupled with drawing)

grok.summary: This single HTML file creates a simple paint app with features like brush textures, color selection, and undo/redo.
grok.instructions: Save as HTML and open in a browser. Click and drag to draw.

gemini.summary: Simplified, fully functional single-file web app using HTML5 canvas and basic JS DOM manipulation.

technical_notes.storage: Undo/Redo via history array storing Data URLs.

chatgpt.summary: Single-file, fully functional tiny Paint-like web app with touch support and keyboard shortcuts.

bug_fix_log.error: Uncaught ReferenceError: can't access lexical declaration 'ctx' before initialization
bug_fix_log.solution: Renamed local variable 'ctx' to 'c' to prevent shadowing the global context.

claude.summary: Fully functional simplified Paint app with three textures: Solid, Spray, and Sketch.
claude.limit: Undo/Redo history support up to 50 steps.
